resources.string: Press the Lock to Log in with your Fingerprint
No Fingerprint Sensor found, press the Lock to Log in with Password
The Biometric Sensors are currently unavailable, press the Lock to log in with Password
There are no Fingerprints registered on this Phone, press the Lock to log in with Password
The Encryption Process failed, if this keeps happening please change your password or deactivate Encryption.
The Decryption Process failed, if this keeps happening please change your password or deactivate Encryption.
